name: Battlevoid: Sector Siege
description: Battlevoid: Sector Siege is an epic straight into action real-time space strategy game, in which the world has been built to deliver a lively battle field; and the action is never more than just seconds away at the start of every game.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10/7/Vista Processor: 1.8 Ghz Processor Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Graphics card: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities. Storage: 250 MB available space
